name: plan-ai
description: Plan AI â€“ AI-assisted meeting planning & execution platform by Blueberrybytes

scripts.clean:install: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf yarn.lock && yarn install && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf yarn.lock && yarn install && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf yarn.lock && yarn install
scripts.update: cd backend && yarn generate:swagger && yarn prisma:migrate && echo 'Waiting 10 seconds for server to be ready...' && sleep 10 && cd ../frontend && yarn generate:types:local && yarn prisma:generate
scripts.docker: cd backend && docker compose up -d && cd ..
scripts.install:all: yarn && cd backend && yarn && cd ../frontend && yarn
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" --prefix "[{name}]" --names "frontend,backend" "cd frontend && yarn start" "cd backend && yarn dev"
scripts.kill-ports: echo 'Killing ports 3000, 8080...' && lsof -ti:3000 | xargs -r kill -9 && lsof -ti:8080 | xargs -r kill -9 && echo 'All ports killed successfully!'
scripts.lint:fix: yarn --cwd backend lint:fix && yarn --cwd frontend lint:fix
scripts.format: yarn --cwd backend format && yarn --cwd frontend format
scripts.test:coverage: yarn --cwd backend test:coverage && yarn --cwd frontend test:coverage
scripts.coverage: yarn --cwd backend test:coverage && yarn --cwd frontend test:coverage
